title: ER Tech Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System
Interview Descriptions: Super easy process. They explain to you what the job position entitles you to do and how they work. HR contacts you and makes you and offer and if you decided to accept then you get the job. Such nice staff and super straight forward. Whole interview took 15 min

title: A/P/Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System
Interview Descriptions: Standard questions asking about your weaknesses, strengths and why do you want to work in this position or at this company, how do you handle stressful situations, if you had a difficult customer...
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System
Interview Descriptions: Interview process itself was thorough but I never received communication regarding whether I vas chosen for the job or not.  I had to call one of the directors to get a response.
Interview Questions: What my plans are for budget retention

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System (Naples, FL) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Recruiter was initial contact. Confirmation by email was made for interview.  Interview process was super simple. Interview was based on going over resume, personal questions and job history.  Questions at end.
Interview Questions:
How would you handle:
experience with hostile patients,
experience with a challenge and stress.

title: General Ledger Accountant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System (Naples, FL) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Great people.  Gave candidate an overview of what to expect. I made him/her feel comfortable.  
Well-spoken and asked the questions that matter.  They do it very shortly.  One hopes they can be part of this team.
Interview Questions: Do you have any questions for us?

title: Medical Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System (Naples, FL) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was easy. They basically want to make sure you will be good on the phone.  Prior call center experience is a plus.  They did not ask any trick questions or anything hard.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: ICU RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System (Naples, FL) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: I was scheduled within two weeks of the application date.  The interview was 1:1, which was nice. I was asked several scenario questions.  About two months later I received an offer.
Interview Questions: Name a time when you were a patient advocate.

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System (Naples, FL)
Interview Descriptions: Phone and in-person interview. Very laid back. A positive experience. Just be yourself and answer honestly. The questions were not difficult to answer.  A very pleasant experience with a good group of people.
Interview Questions: Situational questions how you would handle different scenarios.

title: Lab Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System (Naples, FL) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: Basic Interview Questions. 15 minutes. Nice person, patient and understanding. Appt waited a bit longer bc lab was busy. They will tell you if hired or not. If hired you are given a tour of the lab. Where you can see the different dept where different analysis take place. Meet the durectir if the lab and the pathologist if available.
Interview Questions: How you deal with an angry coworker?

title: RN Specialty Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Physicians Regional Healthcare System (Naples, FL) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: Online application was easy to follow. Interview was based on questions regarding past clinical experience mostly. I was very honest with all the questions even though some of them were probably not what they want to hear. I had tons of questions to ask too during the interview. Overall it was a pleasant experience.
Interview Questions: Tell me about one patient you remember the most.
